storyInfo: Dewville, a remote mountainous village that had become turbulent due to legends of buried treasure, ushers in the arrival of a dashing member of the Victorian Mounted Police: Grani. After rescuing Carol, who was being tortured by bounty hunters, Grani makes a pledge to aid Dewville through their plight.

attributes.content: (...It burns...)
(...It hurts...)
So, the wench still won't speak up?
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: (So thirsty... My throat feels like it's on fire...)
( ...How long have I been here...?)
Hah, what a trooper... She's been dangling here for more than a day, but still won't crack.
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Oi, don't kill her off just yet. She still hasn't told us where the treasure is!
attributes.name: Violent Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: ...I'm not... telling you anything...
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: Have it your way then. Don't give her any water until she decides to cooperate!
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: (Am I... going to die?)
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: So, even in Kazimierz...
...the ruffians run amok everywhere.
Hmm? Huh? Who the hell are you? You got a death wish?
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Oi, kiddo, hurry and scram before...
attributes.name: Violent Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Gaaah! That... that hurt...!
attributes.name: Violent Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: That outfit of his... He's not from these parts.
attributes.name: Violent Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Who the hell cares where he's from! The moron sure doesn't value his life if he wants to fight us all by himself!
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: So, I'm guessing the diplomatic approach isn't going to work?
Unngh!
attributes.name: Violent Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Guhh...
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: Good. They won't be bothering us for a while. Let's leave while we still can.
Who... are you...?
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: Don't be afraid, nobody's going to hurt you anymore. I'll get you out of here.
I'm sorry... My head is... still spinning...
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: You look pretty pale. Don't worry, let me carry you then.
Hold on tight.
Mm...
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: Clear \ Visibility: 14 km
Nearby Village
Have any of you seen a kid with a spear?
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: I was inside the whole time. I didn't see what was going on outside.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: You're gonna be real damn sorry if I find out you've been hiding them!
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: They've left, Miss Grani. It's safe for you two to come out now.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Hup~!
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: Looks like I owe you another one, Mister!
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: Are you okay, Carol? I'm sorry you had to go through that.
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Thank you, Luke. I'm doing much better now.
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: I wouldn't have been able to rescue you without everyone's help.
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: Don't worry, Carol!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: We've been helping out this young knight here! She promised that she'd save our village!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Huh? She?
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: Ah, that's right. I'm a girl.
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: Aww, come on! I might not look it, but I'm a proper maiden on the inside!
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: Ah, um, sorry...
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: It's hard to tell from your outfit, but...
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: Excuse me, are you... the knight from Kazimierz... who was recently anointed?
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: After you save our village... Will you make us pay tribute?
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: No, no. I'm not actually a knight, nor am I even from Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: Even though Victoria does have knights, I was actually just a member of the Mounted Police!
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: Unlike the knights, our only job is to maintain public security. We don't ask for any payment in our line of duty, so of course we wouldn't tax you!
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: Victoria?
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: It's the land that lies beyond Kazimierz. My ancestors were actually all Kurantas who moved there from Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: I came after receiving your village's request for aid. I also wanted to see what my parents' homeland was like, but... I didn't expect the situation to be so dire.
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: ...Sending those pleas for help... felt like leaving messages in the bottle.
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: We're used to most non-governmental organizations ignoring us because we're in such a remote location...
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: I wonder, why didn't the Kazimierz government send out any assistance?
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: Hmph... Why would those high-and-mighty knights even bother coming all the way out here?
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: Even without their help, we've lived here peacefully for many years. The hustle and bustle of the city simply has no appeal for us.
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: For generations, the people of Dewville have lived by these mountains.
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: We might not be wealthy, but we do have a self-sufficient way of life.
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: And though we've sometimes had to evacuate to escape from Catastrophes, this is still our home.
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: That's why... we can't give up this land...
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: But now, the bounty hunters have brought destruction in their wake...
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: ...All because of those 'Knights' Treasures.'
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: Over the last few years, the villages around here have become the bounty hunters' stomping grounds.
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: I heard that a region in the northern part of Kazimierz has been in turmoil, and that has attracted hordes of bounty hunters looking to strike it rich. Apparently, the only way to get up north runs right by our village.
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: In the past, plenty of bounty hunters used to pass through, but they never caused any problems.
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: But about a month ago, some bounty hunters dug up a knight's sarcophagus from these mountains. They even found a small chest of gold coins...
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: Gold coins with the Kazimierz crest on them, like these?
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: Those bounty hunters tried to pick a fight with me as soon as I arrived. I relieved them of these coins as compensation for their rudeness.
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: Mhm... these are the same coins. Our troubles began when a certain saying began to circulate among the bounty hunters.
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: 'The ancient Knights of Kazimierz were all buried with their riches near the lands they once called home. Their souls protect these unmarked graves for all of eternity.'
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: 'Only those who fear not sacrifice and possess the true, dauntless bloodline of Kazimierz may open the path.'
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: Rumors such as these keep spreading, and more and more bounty hunters have been drawn here.
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: At first, all they used to do was discuss where to look for the next big find. But for some reason, they soon started spreading the idea that the villagers knew where the treasures were buried...
attributes.name: Carol

attributes.content: Shh! Everyone, quiet!
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: What do you mean, you couldn't find them? Double back and search harder this time!
attributes.name: Bounty Hunter

attributes.content: It's not safe to stay here. We can't let any more innocents get dragged into this.
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: Anyway, let's get out of here first.
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: Stay safe out there, Miss Knight... I mean, Officer! Please take care of our Chief!
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Don't worry, Mister. I'll be sure to protect
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: Huh? Chief?
attributes.name: Grani

attributes.content: ...I've only been on the job for about half a year, but that'd be me... I might not look it, but I'm a proper chief on the inside~
attributes.name: Carol
